description:
A huge oshie-hagoita (wooden paddle decorated with a brocade portrait) from an anonymous sender suddenly arrives at the art room that has been transformed into the Pretty Boy Detective Club headquarters. The Pretty Boy Detective Club deduce that the sender was Kodaki Kawaike, a first-year student at Yubiwa Academy and Nagahiro’s young fiancée. Contrary to her beautiful looks, Kodaki is feared by the Detective Club members as a demon...
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Oshie to Tabi Suru Bishounen: Sono 1
The Pretty Boy Traveling with the Brocade Portrait (Part 1)
押絵と旅する美少年 その1
